articles.author: European Space Agency
articles.title: Gaia telescope discovers our galaxy's great wave - Phys.org
articles.description: Our Milky Way galaxy never sits still: it rotates and wobbles. And now, data from the European Space Agency's Gaia space telescope reveal that our galaxy also has a giant wave rippling outwards from its center.
articles.content: Our Milky Way galaxy never sits still: it rotates and wobbles. And now, data from the European Space Agency's Gaia space telescope reveal that our galaxy also has a giant wave rippling outwards from … [+5994 chars]
